website_summaries.verdict: These stylish, durable rain boots come in a range of colorful patterns to appeal to kids.
pros: The handles make them easy for kids to pull on themselves
Have a good amount of grip on the soles and reinforced rubber where the soles meet the body to help avoid leaks
cons: No lining, so you may want to size up to fit thick socks

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite boots! We're on pair four (because of size
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite boots! We're on pair four (because of size, not durability), and my son won't wear anything else.
customer_reviews.author: DarkSlide

customer_reviews.title: Good rain boots
customer_reviews.text: My son loves boots at the moment and these are his favorite pair. Now that we are in spring it is nice to have a pair of boots to go outside if it is rainy or muddy. They are a little small but seem to fit him just fine and will likely last us through the season. The construction and materials are good at keeping the water away from his little feet and he loves the fireman pattern and red color. These were the most affordable boots that were of good quality and I will likely purchase another pair next year for him and one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: em56df

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 yr old son. He wears a size 9, but I bought size 11 because he likes to wear 3-4 pairs of socks. (A battle I've chosen not to fight) they fit him comfortably and he likes wearing them. They are not as high quality as Hatley rainboots, but they are also less expensive, so it's a good deal. I would recommend these for a young child that will outgrow them quickly. They're a good price and they seem like they'll hold up for a season.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C.

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Worthy
customer_reviews.text: Love these rain boots. This is our second pair. We buy a size bigger for room and growth. The first pair held up to frequently outdoor play in mud and rocks and has been handed down to the younger sibling. They are still going strong! The straps are perfect for allowing toddlers to put the boots on themselves. Will be buying more when we need them!
customer_reviews.author: Kn1ghtDreamer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My three year old son picked them out and he loves them. He's big on walking through puddles in the rain. They look so cute and they seem comfortable. All shoe brands run differently but I've noticed rain boots always run on the bigger side. We just bought him some converse in size 8 and he has a some room to grow. So I decided to order the size 7 in these rain boots since they don't lace up obviously. And they fit him perfectly! So I would recommend sizing down. His pair last year (not carters) I didn't size down and they would always fall off his feet while sitting in a shopping cart.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good boot for little feet
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month granddaughter loves these boots. She has even mastered putting them on herself. The large "handles" make it easy to do. They are a little tall, hitting her just below the knees, but with a little practise she has been able to stomp in every rain puddle she can find. I was also looking for a lower healed boot. These are not flat but only rise about 1/4 inch. We bought size 5. I like that they are not cartoon/movie themed.
customer_reviews.author: joanmak

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after couple of months
customer_reviews.text: They seemed nice and decent quality but they fell apart after couple of months of use. The rubber started separating on both boots near the ankle where there is a groove design on the boots. Seems like the boots get bent consistently in that one spot when walking and eventually lead to cracking and separation.
customer_reviews.author: ata0318

customer_reviews.title: Great boots get lots of use but strap broke
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots for my boyfriends nephew his mom told me what size so they'd be a little big and he could grow into them. He loves them and I have seen him wear them everytime it rains with his fireman rain jacket. The reason it is not getting 5 stars is because one of the straps broke off on one side. I'm pretty sure a 5 year old doesn't use much strength to put these on. I expected more quality from Carter's.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, great quality, but a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: New review: Although my previous review is still true, I want to add that these boots give blisters on the inside of the foot. My daughter has regular to narrow feet, so I am guessing the boot is made for narrower feet. My daughter loves them so much that she'd rather have a sore foot than not wear them! But I am taking a star off for the issue. Old review: My daughter loves these super cute little boots. She sometimes wears them when it's not even raining. She loves to hit the puddles like Peppa Pig!
customer_reviews.author: French mom

customer_reviews.title: Lady Bug Boots
customer_reviews.text: Very cute rain boots. I ordered the a bit larger so that my granddaughter could grow into them. They seem to look well made and of good quality I did some comparison shopping and found Amazon.com to have the best price on these boots. It pays to shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Marmadilla

customer_reviews.title: So Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Excellent quality. Waterproof, but not warm. Runs large; if in between sizes, go down a size.
customer_reviews.author: KSMcGowan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. My preschooler son put holes on the soles after 3 months!!
customer_reviews.text: It's only been 3months since we have been wearing the red fireman pair of these boots. My son wears his shoes like all other preschoolers. There's already one hole on each sole of the boot (right under the toes). The season isn't even over and his feet and socks are soaked. Never buying these again. Not durable.
customer_reviews.author: skysmom

customer_reviews.title: Fyi
customer_reviews.text: I waited awhile to write this- perfect at first just like everything else when you buy it. However after many mud puddles and park days they wore. Then just started tearing. Lasted maybe a good 6 months. She easily could of worn them way longer, which is why I sized up. If you want heavy duty, this isn’t it. If you want just for looks, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I got the matching jacket for my daughter. When the boat started becoming a little small as she was outgrowing them I took out the insoles and they fit perfectly. She started wearing them when she was two years old and now she will be three and they still fit . This is great because kids feet grow so fast and it still fits. I recommend the jacket to go along with this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: make a splash in these boots
customer_reviews.text: We bought these Carter's boots as a second pair just for outside play. These are Great boots for the little puddle jumpers in your life. Our 2 year old loves his boots. Easy to get on and take off. Very cute space design
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! My toddler loves rain boots and the off brand pair we bought last year conpletely fell apart. She picked these out online. They came within a couple days. She loves them, they seem comfy, fit well, and seem much sturdier and well made than our others. We've had a week of rain since we've received them and theyvare definitely waterproof. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Runs big.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very cute. Quality is good.. but they do run big in size. My daughter uses a size 9 in toddler shoes which is the size I ordered the boots in and they are about a size bigger. I may return and order a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu B. Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Monster cuteness
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo cute! I love the little monsters on the toes and the quality of them is great. These fit my toddler almost all the way up To his knees I thought that they'd would be a little shorter than that but he is tiny so I think that has something to do with it and its really not an issue. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: TW23

customer_reviews.title: Love this rain boots
customer_reviews.text: Love this rain boots. We bought it with a good discount- that was a really good bargain deal. Quality, design, price- this is what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Fedor Vlassov

customer_reviews.title: Boys love these red rain boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these over a year ago for our grandson after he told our daughter that a lot of the kids in his nursery school class or rain boots on rainy days to class. He loves them and is still wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: B. Burger

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old really likes to wear her new ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old really likes to wear her new carter's Ladie-R Rain Boots (size 10). I bought them to match her Wellie Wishers Doll. They look a little different than the doll's boots, but my daughter hasn't said a thing about that, so neither of us care. The boots have kept her feet dry in the rain, but they must be worn with socks or blisters will shortly ensue.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: Soft, colorful, durable.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson LOVES his boots! They have a soft enough lining that he'll even wear them without socks. They clean up well and are holding up to what he is putting them through.
customer_reviews.author: TMN

customer_reviews.title: ... keeps these at school generally and they've held up great, even after months of use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter keeps these at school generally and they've held up great, even after months of use. She loves them and can put them on herself easily. We'll be going with this brand again when we need a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Herring

customer_reviews.title: Great little rain boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots seem to run somewhat large, but that is perfect for little kids. My daughter loves them and can put them on by herself. They keep her feet dry when she is running outside in the rain. They stay on her feet and do not slip off. Great little rain boots!
customer_reviews.author: G. Kay

customer_reviews.title: "You Must Always Wear Your Boots."
customer_reviews.text: Very well made boots and my daughter loves them. They match her rain jacket and are perfect for jumping in muddy puddles like Peppa Pig.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Here's to hoping they last long too
customer_reviews.text: As cute as expected, and they fit my daughter well. These were used in lieu of an Easter basket to hold goodies. Perfect. Here's to hoping they last long too!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great for my puddle lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought them a size bigger, so they slip off sometimes (mostly when I'm carrying him or something, not while playing), but they are great at keeping my almost 3 year old's feet dry! They're easy for him to put on and take off by himself!
customer_reviews.author: R Morty

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her new rain boots. I think ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new rain boots. I think they fit as I expected, but may run large. My daughter had a size 9 in a similar style boot last year, so I ordered a size 10 this year. In regular shoes though, she wears a size 10.5 to 11, so they are bigger than normal shoes (but what I expected for rain boots). If I had ordered an 11, they would have been too big.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cute Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are super cut and true to size! The sole is nice and heay. The only reason for the 4 star is when my daughter got her foot stuck in mud and tried to use to straps to pull up they broke. They worked great for putting on the shoes just not as added assistance for a stuck toddler foot.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely ADORABLE! Bought them for my grandson (he is going ...
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely ADORABLE! Bought them for my grandson (he is going these the fascination with dinosaurs phase) for his third birthday and they are so cute! Everyone at the birthday party asked where I got them from. They are well made and I cannot tell you enough how cute they are! So so fun for a little boy. Your little one will love them!!! I don't think they will provide arch support but when I asked the three year old well... he wasn't able to really tell me if his arches were comfy or not!
customer_reviews.author: wiscgirlinaz

customer_reviews.title: A tad big
customer_reviews.text: This are a bit big but my daughter will grow into them. We bought these to replace the last pair that she grew out of. She loves the loops because she can put them on by herself. When given a choice, she always picks these.
customer_reviews.author: KrbJoy

customer_reviews.title: My son loved them so much he didn't want to take them ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 yr old wears a size 8. I ordered an 8 and they fit just right. I ultimately opted to return them and buy a size up to hopefully get more than one season out of them. My son loved them so much he didn't want to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Thorn

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought next size up for my 2 yr old son and as expected they are a little big on him but he loves them and can still run without tripping in them! The quality is true to Carters Brand. Sturdy base. Bright color, exactly as pictured. Super cute! Typical rain boot. I imagine the straps might eventually break off but I'm not concerned about that especially since I've seen that with many kids rain boots. Kids are hard on their things.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Robison

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots run a little big
customer_reviews.text: I want them to last and wanted to get a size up, after reading reviews, I got his current size and they are a little big. I'm glad I didn't get the next size up as these have plenty of room to grow. They're so cute, we love em!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: this really isn't a bad thing when you're talking toddler fashion
customer_reviews.text: Although bigger than expected, this really isn't a bad thing when you're talking toddler fashion. We had purchased the matching raincoat at the Carter's outlet so once we saw the boots online we knew we had to have them. Such a cute ensemble & I'm not complaining if my baby girl can grow into the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Albie Knows

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boots! The handles make them easy for my 4 year old to out on by himself. They keep his feet dry even when jumping in some seriously big puddles. I know Carters uses a lot of the same patterns (my son has the same pattern & color for pjs) but I wish they also had a rain jacket to match.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: I like how they’re short in height and are comfortable to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, my daughter is size 6 but I ordered size 7 so they last a while. They’re big but she has no issue wearing them. I like how they’re short in height and are comfortable to walk in (compared to rain boots that are knee high).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very tall
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very high!!!! My toddler is on the short side, he could NOT walk because they were so high, he hated them, I will have to return. Very disappointed because they are very well made and are super cute. For a size 5 they were as high as my daughter's size 10, which doesn't make sense!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old daughter loves these boots. They do run a little big, but now we just get to use them longer. Very cute and easy for her to put on herself.
customer_reviews.author: jlfriddle2012

customer_reviews.title: Love these rain boots - they fit correctly and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these rain boots - they fit correctly and easy for my 2 year old to put them on herself. They are a little heavy but that doesn't stop her from wearing them as much as she can. I love them because they match a lot of outfits having a multitude of colors on them.
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: Great Rain Boots! Grandson Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these rain boots! He loves the space theme pattern and he's the only boy at school with these. Practically, they do the job. They go on easily and keep his feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: Drummer Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof and cute boots!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our 3-year-old to trek through Ireland last fall, and she's enjoying them all winter when it rains, along with wearing them through our sloppy wet forest trail weekly! Mud washes right off! Great boots, waterproof, and very cute!
customer_reviews.author: darnett

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was very happy with these boots
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very happy with these boots, even though they dug into part of each foot. I am disappointed with them because they didn't last very long. It only took a couple months of wearing them before they split up the side.
customer_reviews.author: E. Searles

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and unlike other rain boots we've tried
customer_reviews.text: My daughter literally wears these everywhere. All year round, rain or shine. They are a huge hit!! Great fit and unlike other rain boots we've tried, these are still holding together with no leaking at all. Highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Well made and cute
customer_reviews.text: They look well made. I bought them a little big so we could use them longer. My daughter likes to jump in muddy puddles of course and they are working great. And the design is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: joolsangle

customer_reviews.title: these have held up great, are good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: these have held up great, are good quality for the price. These are adorable! Got these at the same time as another brand pair of boots that were twice the cost, and the other pair are cracking and look terrible already, I would certainly purchase these again come next year!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Williams

customer_reviews.title: With them being a bit bigger I was worried he would have a hard time walking in them but so far he does fine.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really been able to use these yet but my 2 year old loves them. I bought a size bigger so he could grow in to them this summer. With them being a bit bigger I was worried he would have a hard time walking in them but so far he does fine.
customer_reviews.author: Renee L Deemter

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable. Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. Quality is great, nice and tall for deep puddles, and love the handles to pull the boots up with. They run a little large, which actually is to our benefit, as our little one is near outgrowing some of her other shoes in the same size. Definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Forney

customer_reviews.title: My kids love jumping in muddy puddles (thank you
customer_reviews.text: My kids love jumping in muddy puddles (thank you, peppa pig!) so rain boots are an essential part of my childrens' wardrobe. These boots are adorable and my son loves the moster pirates. The rubber these boots are made out of is thick and durable. They keep his feet dry, so they get 5 stars in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're adorable and durable. I purchased my son's boots a little over sized to grow into and even with the slight extra space, he can walk comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: aubrie

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots because my niece loves them. I bought for a present and she immediately put them on. I'm told she puts them back into the box when she is finished wearing for the day. They are well made and loops at the top help her put them on.
customer_reviews.author: ScreamyMeMe

customer_reviews.title: Carters Rain Boots
customer_reviews.text: These rain boots are adorable! I ordered them big for my daughter so she can grow into them. She wears them all the time playing outside. The dogs on them are too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Alonen

customer_reviews.title: Fun Rainboots
customer_reviews.text: My son adores these. I love how playful they are, without being over the top. They fit very well. Light, simple lining inside. Decent grip on the bottom, but they're still rainboots...so...slippery. The handles mean my son (2.5yo) can pull them on himself.
customer_reviews.author: Belén

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boots
customer_reviews.text: Great quality boots! Bought a pair for my daughter for Christmas. She wears them all the time and they've held up great. I bought her a size larger than she wears so she could wear them longer and it hasn't been a problem
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: this is finally an amazing find. My son has chubby
customer_reviews.text: After ordering Kamik, Crocs and other rain boots that did not fit well... this is finally an amazing find. My son has chubby, wide feet and this finally fits him well. Great quality, not too heavy and not too rigid. Nice print, my little one loves it!
customer_reviews.author: E. V. Walnut Creek

customer_reviews.title: A nice soft rubber boot
customer_reviews.text: A nice soft rubber set of boots for my son that are kept at his school. The fit as expected and are not ridged as some cheaper boots can be, making them more difficult to get on and off (important for him to be able to get on by himself easily).
customer_reviews.author: Robby B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute rain boots for a boy or fire fighter enthusiast
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Run big, and TALL: ) my toddler has ...
customer_reviews.text: Run big, and TALL :) my toddler has a hard time walking in them as they're almost to his knees but because they run big I'm hoping we can use them in a couple months when he's a tad taller!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for wet days
customer_reviews.text: Holding up, keeps his feet dry. And he likes them enough that he puts them on frequently throughout the day. Nice for wet days, and for quick slip on protection. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: These are soooooo cute for my dog obsessed daughter. ...
customer_reviews.text: These are soooooo cute for my dog obsessed daughter. She's so thrilled with them and asks for her "puppy shoes" every day!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: They seem a bit tall but that might be because the toddler is so small! otherwise they are great
customer_reviews.author: Jena Freyermuth

customer_reviews.title: qualtiy
customer_reviews.text: grandson wears a size 51/2 (toddler) first ordered a 6. far too big. returned for a 5. large but not as large as a 6. will keep. very excited to walk in puddles with them and wear to beach in the off season.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Donat

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old son starts wearing size 5, ...
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old son starts wearing size 5, and his sneakers in multiple brands fit well. This size 5 rain boots is way too big inside. It's closer to size 6. He couldn't walk well in this rain boots and kept falling down.
customer_reviews.author: T. B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well made rain boots
customer_reviews.text: These rain boots are very cute and well made. The handles on the sides make them easy for my son to pull them on all by himself. The material seems durable and likely to hold up while my son goes splashing though puddles.
customer_reviews.author: Heather CTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: But we love them and will be able to wear them for ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He always wants to wear them. They do seem to run a little big. I went up a size and they're even bigger than I expected. Carters clothes run small usually so I thought same for shoes... but nope. But we love them and will be able to wear them for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Paired with a matching green frog
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them. Great quality. Paired with a matching green frog raincoat
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Carter's Boys' Fire Rain Boot
customer_reviews.text: Great for wet days and costume. Fits great and well made. Carter is known for quality so I am sure he will outgrow them before they wear out. Seller shipped them quickly and is selling them for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Luster

customer_reviews.title: These boots are super cute and fit my daughter well
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super cute and fit my daughter well. She has been wearing a 5 but brands are so varied so I ordered a 6 to be safe for now, and she throws them on and runs around in them already, looking forward to getting good use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart too soon
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in these boots. My son has been wearing them about two months. There is already a hole in the top of the toe area. I'm not even sure how that happens. And the lining on the inside is separating from the rubber. I'm hoping these make it through the season. I won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My two year old loves boots and these are adorable!! Also great because he can put them ...
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves boots and these are adorable!! Also great because he can put them on himself! Fits prefect.
customer_reviews.author: H Ham

customer_reviews.title: so for a rain boot they are pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these rain boots! They aren't too heavy, and they have cushion inside, so for a rain boot they are pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: lesam

customer_reviews.title: Bit too big
customer_reviews.text: I give the shipping a 3 star, The boots came in there shoe boxes but package in a bag rather then a box which I opened up to find the shoe boxes all smudged from shipping. But overall the boots are very cute, a bit too big for my little guy but he seem to not mind wearing them. He has to get used of walking around in them and he can definitely grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim77

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just what I expected and my daughter likes them!
customer_reviews.author: Judi1080

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Firefighter boots
customer_reviews.text: They are a Christmas present and he will love the Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Cutest boots ever. I bought the matching coat and my daughter just loved them both!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We got these to match the raincoat that we loved so much and we were not disappointed at all with these. Although a little big we can get away with it and my sone wants to wear them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pull on and take off and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: tigerliley

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo loves them. They are not the color ...
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves them. They are not the color pictured, though. The black is more of a purple. . . . but I don't care because she doesn't care.
customer_reviews.author: WBA

customer_reviews.title: Super cute boots
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boots. I bought a size 5 for my 18m twins, they have a hard time walking in them because the boots are tall and heavy. If i had to do it over i would wait a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin West

customer_reviews.title: Great rubber boot for 5 year old to put on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great rubber boot for 5 year old to put on with pajamas on the weekends and run through the dewey grass while waiting on pancakes and bacon. She's ready to take them off in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable my toddler is on year 2 with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for granddaughter so do not know about support, etc. But they were a big hit! The quality seems excellent, and they are very attractive. Totally happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene B.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old selected these online and loved them when they arrived. Very cute and appear well made.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these rain boots for my little boy ! My son is a 6 but I ordered one size up for a little extra room for him to grow into it use thicker socks .
customer_reviews.author: Jamee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Rain Boot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and sizing for my 4 year old grand daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Cam Mumpower

customer_reviews.title: Firefighter boots are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy boots. Nicely cushioned inside. Big hit with my 2 1/2 year old grandson. He tried them on and wore them all afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: they are well made and so very cute, just ...
customer_reviews.text: they are well made and so very cute, just waiting til my granddaughter comes to visit to make sure they fit.
customer_reviews.author: gloria hays

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Theres a carters raincoat at Target that is very similar and it looks so cute.
customer_reviews.author: kelfrag

customer_reviews.title: Not quite red!
customer_reviews.text: They are great little rain boots and my little girl loves the pattern.The only thing is the are not red but more of salmon colour!
customer_reviews.author: Vesna

customer_reviews.title: Little one loves them
customer_reviews.text: Cute little boots. My little one loves them. Lasted 9 months before they split on side. I'll be ordering another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Texas wife and mother

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond perfect! Great quality and extremely easy for my little one to put on herself. She is able to run and play with no issues of heaviness. The best part about these is that they don't smell of toxic plastic and rubber. I really like the smooth soft pink lining inside too. :) I wish they came in my size! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Raeleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a 4yr old.
customer_reviews.text: Out 4yr old fits right into these. He wears them most afternoons while he plays in the backyard and garden. No complaints about hurting his feet. NO news is good news from a 4yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Amber R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boots for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. The handles are helpful. Quality is good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kil

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Not bright pink as described below...these are red and black, and SUPER adorable! Wish they made them in adult sizes. Incredible value, equal quality to Western Chiefs rain boots, only cuter.
customer_reviews.author: LDavis

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute! My only complaint is that a few of the "teeth" aren't glued down completely. I'll have to glue them down so that my son doesn't pull at them.
customer_reviews.author: Kksoprano

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty
customer_reviews.text: These came covered in smudges, fingerprints, and splash marks. One of the ladybugs eyes is missing some paint and part of the back of one shoe looks like it was glued together wrong when it was made. Overall they look cheap and I'm not sure why they arrived dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible boots. We bought them to match the coat. My toddler wore them for a few hours and one of the loops completely broke off when he pull the boot on. Carter's usually has great stuff but I was greatly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Ruffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 yr old son and he loves it!! It's a perfect fit! The quality of the boots are good and the design is so cute!! Great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected, fits great, my little girl loves them and they do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Moeai

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, but sending them back because someone gave my granddaughter some boots. Will re-order a larger size so she can have them for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: carter's Rain Boot (Toddler/Little Kid)
product_meta.description:
Slip on design with pull-up handles for easy on/off

Founded in 1865, Carter's has dressed generations of children. It all began when William Carter decided to knit mittens in his kitchen. Today, Carter's is the No. 1 children's brand, selling more than ten products for every child born in the U.S. Carter's has a childlike point-of-view that reflects its heritage of innovation and expertise. Carter's makes clothing for children from newborn through size 7: baby, sleepwear, playclothes and accessories. The company provides trusted products that are super comfy, easy-to-care-for, adorable and don't break the bank.
feature_bullets: Pull-up handles allow for easy on and off
A playful print makes for a fun rainy day
Thick outsoles protect from bad weather conditions
